name: Fists
description: Deadly, given enough repetition

name: Talons
description: Large sharp talons ready to slice you open

name: Teeth
description: Them's bitin' words!

name: Feces
description: Not very deadly, but smelly and annoying.

name: Syringe
description: A very large needle for drawing blood without much care for whether the subject survives

name: Scalpel
description: A small surgeon's scalpel

name: Baton
description: A heavy stick with a handle

name: Utility Knife
description: A short, sharp knife

name: Rapier
description: A stylish 18th-century thrusting sword

name: Longsword
description: A sweet medieval-looking sword

name: Tiny Laser Gun
description: A tiny little laser meant more for incentivizing than injuring. Annoying but not very deadly.

name: Small Laser Gun
description: A forearm-sized experimental laser gun. Hard to dodge.

name: Big Laser Gun
description: A bulky, powerful experimental laser gun. Does more damage, but is easier to dodge, than its smaller counterpart.

name: Small TZR
description: A small electroshock weapon

name: Big TZR
description: An electroshock weapon with a larger-than-usual battery

name: Shock Baton
description: A baton that shocks the victim on contact

name: Bone Saw
description: A bloody saw used for cutting "meat."

name: Handgun
description: A security guard sidearm with 24 rounds. Don't worry about reloading.

name: AR-15
description: A low-accuracy assault rifle meant for doing a lot of damage at short range

name: Rock
description: A medium-sized rock that was just sort of lying around

name: Piece of Rebar
description: A piece of rebar from some crumbling concrete
